category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMToolAssemblyAndComponentIDAutoGenerated
preference.preference_description: Defines whether "new Item ID" auto generation is used for the advanced tool assembly and component creation functionality. * true : The Item ID is automatically generated using a prefix (from the class alias name) and a counter. * false : The Item ID can be assigned with the existing "Assign" functionality. This is the default value.
